job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: I am hiring #DataScientist in #Seattle WA for a renowned #pharmaceutuical client.  Qualification and Experience: •	BS degree with 4+ years of experience, a M.Sc. degree with 2+ years of experience or a recent PhD in Statistics, Biostatistics, Computer Science, Bioinformatics or similar fields •	Strong desire to learn with an interest in immuno-oncology and cellular therapy •	Experienced in interdisciplinary collaborations at the interface of data science and life sciences •	Proficient in good coding practices •	Command of data science stack of tools: R/Python, notebooks and git •	Experience with R Shiny, Dash, Plotly, Streamlit, or other reactive visualization framework •	Experience with APIs, or ability to quickly learn how to use them (e.g., R httr or Python requests) •	Experienced in data visualization and analytics •	Experienced in setting up data workflows that interface with diverse ecosystem of data platforms and APIs •	Computing proficiency: Base knowledge of Linux OS and interaction with cloud-resources particularly AWS  Preferred:  •	Experience with practicing Agile •	Preferred: Experience with clinical data practices and standards •	Preferred: Experience working with omics and/or flow cytometry data •	Preferred: Experience with CI/CD framework and SQL
